description: StrokesPlus.net, the successor to StrokesPlus, is a completely free mouse gesture recognition utility for Windows which allows you to create powerful mouse gestures that save you time.
notes: This will not be able to interact with elevated windows (e.g. Task Manager) unless you run as administrator. You can use the settingsfile="C:\Path\SettingsFile.ext" command line parameter to specify a custom location for your settings (make sure to move your file there first, or you will get the default settings)
